answers.answer: omg I totally feel your pain I'm really close almost 38 weeks and still no sign of my love muffin wanting to be here :/ it's so frustrating because I'm so ready to hold him an see his handsome face
Exactly how i feel :( your so close though chin up bub will get here soon i feel like baby is never going to get here lol i still got 11 weeks left aasrh :(

Guess what. I had baby yesterday! 37w3d 4:06pm c-section. I had been admitted did to bp not coming down at labs and my obg midwife wanted him NOW! Well I was given all the medicine to help me contract and for him to be ready and nothing!  He was so stubborn to the fact that he would not accept the potocin either(I think I spelled right) so c-section it was.

I am 29 weeks and soooooo ready too! As a matter of fact, I JUST woke up from a dream about having my son and he was so beautiful I couldn't stop looking at him and admiring him. I was so sad when I woke up and he was still in my belly lol ughhhhhhhh.I cannot wait to meet him!!

I hear you! I'm 35+3 and so ready to have my Prince Charming. Knut don't worry once you hit 30 weeks it goes by so fast but not fast enough. Well actually my pregnancy has gone by pretty fast other than my urgency off having him lol. It feels like yesterday I found I was pregnant (7 weeks) and now I'm at 35.
Yesssss! I'm almost 28 weeks and I can not wait, I want my little man.
30 weeks and 2 days and getting super impatient, too! My bestfriend is getting induced Monday so I'm super jealous ! But happy for her of course . I just wish these last weeks fly by!

Im 33 on sat and im so sock of been pregnant. Iv been having such a **** time since day one and it just kept getting worse. Between a boss been means, pelvic girdle pain and gestational diabetes im just so over it!I feel terrible but i keep hoping he comes early.Dont get me wrong im very greatful to be pregnant and i cant wait to meet him and be a mam.

question: Im 29 weeks in two days and just want my baby here already :( i see so many post amd congrats to you all that have had your babys wish time would fly for me! Anyone else feeling my pain
title: so jealous :(
